about_the_game:
Whether you're an upcoming rapper, famed freestyler, or Joe, the spotlight is yours. Rap battle others, using our freestyling tools to enhance your rapping sessions.

Live Battles

Get up on stage to freestyle over a beat and perform to a live audience. Will they like your freestyle? Will they hate it? Will you be voted off stage? Only one way to find out.

Be The Audience

You have a 70% chance each game to be part of the audience! You get to decide who wins the battle, or who will get booted off the stage. Judge fairly, or not, give the performers what they deserve!

Use Our Tools

Freestyle Studio includes 4 tools to enhance your freestyling abilities, use them to gain advantages in battles, or don't.

-Rhyme practice (includes personal rhyme dictionary)
-Verse completer (choose between rhyme or leading up to the rhyme)
-Free beats (you're given a word to rhyme with over a beat)
-Starter dictionary (ways to begin a freestyle and easy words to rhyme)

Customize Your Character

Choose the items that fit you on stage. Whether that be a mustache, some swimmer goggles, a cowboy hat, etc. Be yourself!

content_descriptors.notes: Players you face off against in game are not censored, they are able to say anything.

name: Freestyle Studio

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3.6 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 1030
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4.6 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050

short_description: Rap battle others, practice your freestyling skills, advance in the rapping community. Freestyle Studio is a fun way to practice your rapping skills, whether that be alone or against others.
